And the winner is…

The video game was created by a man named Satoshi Tajiri from Japan.He loved collecting insects as a kid, and he wanted to make a game where people could collect and trade creatures – just like he used to collect bugs!
Pokemon started as a video game in 1996
The word “Pokémon” is a combination of two words: “Pocket” and “Monsters.”
It’s like having your own little pocket-sized monsters to play with and train!
There are over 1000 different species of Pokémon! Imagine having so many unique friends to catch and train. How many can you think of? Make sure to comment below!

Have you seen any of the Pokémon movies?They bring the adventures to life on the big screen.Ash, Pikachu, and their friends have faced legendary Pokémon and saved the day in these really exciting films.In the Pokémon animated TV show you’ll follow Ash Ketchum and his journey to become a Pokémon Master.

Pokémon has an awesome trading card game that lets you collect and battle with your favourite Pokémon cards.

It’s like having your own Pokémon battles in card form!
